posts.title: Earthworm Jerky
posts.content: Treat your taste buds to a little exotic flavor by snacking on this yummy earthworm jerky. Made with no artificial flavoring or colors, these boiled and dehydrated earthworms are seasoned with garlic and onion powder, red chilis – and are a great source of protein.

posts.title: Star Wars Augmented Reality Game
posts.content: Awaken your inner Jedi with this Star Wars augmented reality game. This captivating and immersive game trains you on how to become a fearless Jedi and expertly wield your lightsaber so that you can battle foes like Kylo Ren and the sinister Darth Vader.

posts.title: Som Sleep Formula
posts.content: Som helps support sleep. Safe for daily use, drug free, non-habit forming, and it’s only 40 calories! This Scientifically Advanced gluten-free and dairy-free Formula uses ingredients naturally found in your body and a healthy diet.

posts.title: Keurig K-Mini
posts.content: The Keurig K-Mini makes it possible to enjoy a top quality roast virtually anywhere you go. It can brew up to 12 ounces, features a spacious storage area large enough to hold up to 9 pods, and a slim 5″ wide design that make it ideal for virtually any counter top.

posts.title: Avocado Tree Growing Kit
posts.content: Keep a steady supply of fresh food at your home by growing your very own avocado tree using this simple kit. This small plastic gadget incorporates a hole at the center where you place an avocado pit to facilitate the germination process.

posts.title: Rick And Morty Monopoly
posts.content: Buy, sell, and trade your way around the universe by sitting around the table for a rousing game of Rick and Morty Monopoly. You and five of your closest glip glops will take an interdimensional journey as everyone makes their way around the game board.

posts.title: Wireless Charging Mouse Pad
posts.content: This wireless charging mouse pad makes keeping your electronic devices juiced up more convenient than ever. Available in both standard and fast charging models, it comes with an ample area designed to charge your smartphone simply by laying it down on the pad.

posts.title: Reflective Fire Glass
posts.content: Make your next bonfire look like fucking sorcery by incorporating some reflective fire glass. Apart from giving your fire an other-worldly appearance, the glass pieces provide hours of heat long after you turn the gas off.

posts.title: Milk And Cookies Shot Maker
posts.content: Step up your snacking game by using this milk and cookies shot maker to craft some delicious edibles. This easy to use device comes with a non-stick silicone mold that lets you make six small cookie shot glasses that are ideal for filling up with milk.

posts.title: Travel Organizational Packing Cubes
posts.content: Keep the inside of your suitcase from looking like a total pigsty with these travel organizational packing cubes from Vasco. The set comes with a series of individual cubes that will help keep all of your possessions totally organized.

posts.title: Phone-Free Music Streaming Device
posts.content: Take your streaming music on-the-go without needing a smartphone using the Mighty music streaming device. Connecting via Bluetooth or WiFi, it syncs to your Spotify account and can store 48 hours of music that can be played without needing an internet connection.

posts.title: 6-In-1 Camera Lens iPhone Case
posts.content: Make the most of your smartphone’s camera by protecting your phone with this 6-in-1 camera lens iPhone case. The case allows you to effortlessly switch between lenses like a 2X telephoto, a 120 degree wide-angle, and a 20X super macro lens for incredible shots.
